00028 #pragma once
00029 
00030 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00031 
00036 typedef struct l4_kernel_info_t
00037 {
00038   /* offset 0x00 */
00039   l4_uint64_t            magic;               
00042   l4_uint64_t            version;             
00043   l4_uint8_t             offset_version_strings; 
00044   l4_uint8_t             fill2[7];            
00045   l4_uint8_t             kip_sys_calls;       
00046   l4_uint8_t             fill3[7];            
00047 
00048   /* the following stuff is undocumented; we assume that the kernel
00049      info page is located at offset 0x1000 into the L4 kernel boot
00050      image so that these declarations are consistent with section 2.9
00051      of the L4 Reference Manual */
00052 
00053   /* offset 0x20 */
00054   /* Kernel debugger */
00055   l4_umword_t            init_default_kdebug; 
00056   l4_umword_t            default_kdebug_exception; 
00057   l4_umword_t            scheduler_granularity; 
00058   l4_umword_t            default_kdebug_end;  
00059 
00060   /* offset 0x40 */
00061   /* Sigma0 */
00062   l4_umword_t            sigma0_esp;          
00063   l4_umword_t            sigma0_eip;          
00064   l4_umword_t            _res01[2];           
00065 
00066   /* offset 0x60 */
00067   /* Sigma1 */
00068   l4_umword_t            sigma1_esp;          
00069   l4_umword_t            sigma1_eip;          
00070   l4_umword_t            _res02[2];           
00071 
00072   /* offset 0x80 */
00073   /* Root task */
00074   l4_umword_t            root_esp;            
00075   l4_umword_t            root_eip;            
00076   l4_umword_t            _res03[2];           
00077 
00078   /* offset 0xA0 */
00079   /* L4 configuration */
00080   l4_umword_t            l4_config;           
00089   l4_umword_t            mem_info;            
00090   l4_umword_t            kdebug_config;       
00111   l4_umword_t            kdebug_permission;   
00137   /* offset 0xC0 */
00138   l4_umword_t            total_ram;           
00139   l4_umword_t            processor_info;      
00140   l4_umword_t            _res04[14];          
00141 
00142   /* offset 0x140 */
00143   volatile l4_cpu_time_t clock;               
00144   l4_umword_t            _res05[1];           
00145 
00146   /* offset 0x160 */
00147   l4_umword_t            frequency_cpu;       
00148   l4_umword_t            frequency_bus;       
00149 
00150   /* offset 0x178 */
00151   l4_umword_t            _res06[5];           
00152 
00153   /* offset 0x1A0 */
00154   l4_umword_t            _res07[4];           
00155 
00156   /* offset 0x1C0 */
00157   l4_umword_t    user_ptr;            
00158   l4_umword_t    vhw_offset;          
00159   l4_umword_t            _res08[2];
00160 
00161   /* offset 0x1E0 */
00162   struct l4_kip_platform_info    platform_info;
00163 } l4_kernel_info_t;
